org.apache.flink.graph.drivers

类 ConnectedComponents<K extends java.lang.Comparable<K>,VV,EV>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.graph.drivers.parameter.ParameterizedBase
      • org.apache.flink.graph.drivers.DriverBase<K,VV,EV>
        • org.apache.flink.graph.drivers.ConnectedComponents<K,VV,EV>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Driver<K,VV,EV>, Parameterized

    public class ConnectedComponents<K extends java.lang.Comparable<K>,VV,EV>
extends DriverBase<K,VV,EV>
    Driver for GSAConnectedComponents.

    The gather-sum-apply implementation is used because scatter-gather does not handle object reuse (see FLINK-5891).

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      private static class  ConnectedComponents.MapVertices<T,VT>
      Initialize vertices into separate components by setting each vertex value to the vertex ID.

      • plan

        public DataSet plan(Graph<K,VV,EV> graph)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: Driver
        "Run" algorithms and analytics on the input graph. The execution plan is not finalized here but in the output methods.

        Drivers are first configured, next planned, and finally the chosen output method is called.

        A null value should be returned when the Driver does not execute a GraphAlgorithm but only executes a GraphAnalytic.

        参数:
        graph - input graph
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - on error
